Michael Vick is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title.`` I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football,'' he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. know, there's a lot of talk these days around here about where members of Congress are going to sit during the State of the Union address,'' Indiana Republican Mike Pence said recently on the House floor.
